title: Author Correction: Intravenous and intracranial GD2-CAR T cells for H3K27M+ diffuse midline gliomas
author: Michelle Monje
excerpt: Nature - Author Correction: Intravenous and intracranial GD2-CAR T cells for H3K27M+ diffuse midline gliomas
text: Correction to: Nature https://doi.org/10.1038/s41586-024-08171-9 Published online 13 November 2024In the version of the article initially published, the reference Maude, S. L. et al. Tisagenlecleucel in children and young adults with B-cell lymphoblastic leukemia. N. Engl. J. html:
Correction to: Nature https://doi.org/10.1038/s41586-024-08171-9 Published online 13 November 2024

In the version of the article initially published, the reference Maude, S. L. et al. Tisagenlecleucel in children and young adults with B-cell lymphoblastic leukemia. N. Engl. J. Med. 378, 439–448 (2018) was originally ref. 2 and cited in the Abstract, but has now been removed from the Abstract and renumbered as ref. 3 in the HTML and PDF versions of the article
